official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to delete certain requirements applicable to food additives and color additives.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to repeal the blanket prohibition against regulations deeming safe any cancer-inducing food additives or color additives in food, drugs, or cosmetics (the "Delaney clause"). Abolishes the advisory committee of experts established to review regulations disapproving color additives as cancer-inducing.
